ygData.subject: Re: Level 34 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Thunderclap is research only (i think), common portal is a lvl 39 spell, it can be found in erudin s library, i think even in felwith ( not sure). I found
ygData.messageBody:
Thunderclap is research only (i think), common portal is a lvl 39 spell, it
can be found in erudin's library, i think even in felwith ( not sure). I
found nullify magic at the shaman guild in halas.

Gydgith lightweaver,
bristlebane

>JUST made my level (finally) and searched around for spells.. There were
>3 that I wanted that I couldn't find anywhere (checked Felwith, Erude,
>and AkAnon) - Nullify Magic, Thunderclap and Common Portal. Anyone know
>if all THREE of these are research only, or did I just miss em?
>
>Thanks!
>Micon Bittermage
>Karana
